metadata.Title: CVE-2023-24535 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: Parsing invalid messages can panic. Parsing a text-format message which contains a potential number consisting of a minus sign, one or more characters of whitespace, and no further input will cause a panic.

notes.Note: alexmurray> google-guest-agent contains a vendored copy of golang-goprotobuf mdeslaur> Introduced by: https://go-review.googlesource.com/c/protobuf/+/473015 Fixed by: https://github.com/protocolbuffers/protobuf-go/commit/edaf511a7a37a90db2727b600d699e1e8d2840b4

criterions.comment: golang-goprotobuf package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
